skills.title: Front-End Development

skills.description: Experienced in PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn, and advanced data visualization with Power BI, specializing in predictive modeling and data analysis.

skills.description: Expertise in open-source LLMs, prompt engineering, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), achieving a 40% improvement in chatbot answer precision.

skills.title: Data Visualization

skills.description: Experience with system design for projects like a solar-powered heating system, optimizing water heating and purification, and designing scalable back-end systems.

skills.title: Programming Languages
skills.description: Proficient in Python, Java, C++, SQL, and MATLAB, with experience in leveraging these languages for machine learning, data analysis, and software development projects.

skills.title: Research
skills.description: Experienced with computational modeling, analyzing cognitive processes, optimizing model parameters, and validating findings through simulations, with experience in interdisciplinary research and creating clear visualizations.

portfolio.title: Recipe Search Software
portfolio.description: Developed a recipe search application in Java with a collaborative team, integrating APIs and user-driven contributions to boost daily active users by 40%.

portfolio.title: Image Filter Server
portfolio.description: Built a C++ server application enabling users to upload photos and apply filters via a user-friendly web interface, optimizing the image processing workflow for enhanced performance.

portfolio.title: Item Response Theory (IRT) Model
portfolio.description: Enhanced an IRT model for individualized learning assessments, achieving a 90% improvement in accuracy by optimizing model parameters and algorithms.

portfolio.title: F1 Predictive Model
portfolio.description: Developed a machine learning model using RNN and LSTM to predict F1 driver lap times and positions, achieving 80% accuracy and predictions within 3 seconds of target lap times.

portfolio.title: DRM Sleep Simulation
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a Python-based simulation model utilizing LSTM neural networks to analyze the effects of sleep on DRM false memory formation, successfully replicating empirical study findings.

experience.title: Internal Outreach Director, Illuminate
experience.description: As an Internal Outreach Director, I lead initiatives to engage and inspire students within our organization, fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment. I coordinate and promote events that bridge interdisciplinary interests in computer science, AI, and ethics, helping students connect with opportunities, gain insights, and develop a network for career and academic growth. My role involves liaising with team members to organize impactful events, streamline communications, and build lasting connections within the community.

experience.title: Data Engineer, Northbridge Insurance
experience.description: At Northbridge Insurance, I focused on developing AI-driven solutions, particularly in the realm of chatbot and data automation. I built an intelligent chatbot designed to translate natural language into SQL queries, using open-source large language models (LLMs) and advanced prompt engineering techniques. By integrating Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), the chatbot could clarify user inputs and offer adaptive responses, enabling seamless interaction with complex databases. Leveraging the Cortex API, I enhanced the chatbot's precision by 40%, ensuring it provided contextually accurate, data-driven answers. This innovation improved internal data accessibility, empowering users to make informed decisions efficiently. Additionally, I deployed these advancements through intuitive web applications with Streamlit and React, optimizing user experience and workflow productivity

experience.title: Software Developer, Medium AI
experience.description: At Medium AI, I am actively involved in the full-stack development of a medical scribe platform, leveraging React and JavaScript to optimize user experience and scalability. Collaborating with the AI research team, I am contributing to the design and implementation of a DirectRAG model that transforms transcripts into precise, medical-grade documentation. This role allows me to merge advanced AI technology with intuitive design, addressing real-world challenges in medical documentation.
